medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had been doing relatively well until about two days ago when his daughters noted he had less appetite and seemed less energetic. He experienced some nausea but denied vomiting. He initially did not complain of abdominal pain at home but now endorses it and cannot give a good history of when this started.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paroxysmal a.fib, S/P PPM, ___ Disease with difficulties in swallowing, bradykinesia, gait difficulty; on Sinemet, mild cognitive impairment; on donezepil, diastolic CHF EF of 70%, aortic stenosis, arthritis (especially of left knee), insomnia, urinary incontinence, occasional fecal incontinence, occasional constipation, history of orthostasis and syncopal episodes, glaucoma s/p laser treatment to left eye, hard of hearing.
medical_history.family_history: Notable for fatal embolism in his father. His mother died of complications of a hip fracture. No family history of premature CAD.
